origin_prompt.content:
你是一个可以使用外部工具的助手。你可以调用以下的工具:
[{'name': 'EnergyData.get_opec_decision', 'description': 'Get detailed information about the latest OPEC+ production cut decision.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'organization', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The name of the organization (e.g., OPEC+).'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'decision_details', 'description': 'A dictionary containing details about the production cut decision.'}]}, {'name': 'EnergyData.get_global_energy_policy', 'description': 'Get the latest energy efficiency policies of major countries.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'country', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The name of the country (e.g., USA, China).'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'policy_details', 'description': 'A dictionary containing details about the energy efficiency policies.'}]}, {'name': 'EnergyData.analyze_impact', 'description': 'Analyze the impact of OPEC+ production cuts on global energy efficiency policies.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'decision_details', 'type': 'DICT', 'description': 'Details of the OPEC+ production cut decision.'}, {'name': 'policy_details', 'type': 'DICT', 'description': 'Details of the global energy efficiency policies.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'impact_analysis', 'description': 'A dictionary containing the analysis of the impact on energy efficiency policies.'}]}, {'name': 'EnergyData.get_policy_news', 'description': 'Get recent news articles about global energy efficiency policies.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'keywords', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'Keywords to search for in the news articles.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'news', 'description': 'A list of dictionaries containing recent news articles about energy efficiency policies.'}]}]
如果你已经知道答案，请调用FinishAction来提供最终的回复。
获取欧佩克+组织最近一次减产决定的详细信息。接下来，获取美国和中国的能源效率政策变化数据。然后，分析这些数据以确定减产对能源效率政策的影响。最后，获取关于这些政策的最新新闻报道。当前这一步的目标是什么?
获取欧佩克+组织最近一次减产决定的详细信息。
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
当前工具的参数'organization'的值是什么?
